layout.title: Custom Website Development
layout.description: Professional custom website development with lightning-fast performance, SEO optimization, mobile responsiveness, and unlimited edits. We manage everything for you.

hero.title: The Website Your Thai Massage Business Deserves
hero.text: Professional, fast-loading websites built specifically for Thai massage businesses. We handle everything—design, hosting, maintenance, forever.
hero.imageAlt: Professional web developer working on custom website

services.title: More Bookings, Less Stress, Zero Technical Headaches

items.title: Get More Bookings Every Month
items.text: A professional website working 24/7 to turn visitors into customers. More enquiries, more appointments, more revenue—while you focus on treatments, not tech.

items.title: Stop Losing Customers to Competitors
items.text: When customers search online, a professional website makes them choose you over outdated competitors still relying on Facebook. First impressions win bookings.

items.title: Run Your Business, Not Your Website
items.text: No technical headaches, no surprise costs, no learning curve. We handle everything forever—you just enjoy the results and run your business.

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say About Their Websites

items.text: Our new website is incredibly fast and looks amazing on all devices. We've seen a 40% increase in enquiries since launching. The team manages everything for us - it's completely hassle-free. Best investment we've made for our business.
items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.title: Owner, Thai Wellness Spa

items.text: Finally ranking on the first page of Google! The website is beautiful, super fast, and I can request unlimited changes whenever I need them. They truly manage everything - I don't have to think about the technical stuff at all.
items.name: James Martinez
items.title: Director, Serenity Massage Clinic

features.imageAlt: Professional web development team at work
features.title: Everything You Need, Built In
features.text: Six essential features included as standard. No hidden costs, no expensive add-ons, no surprises—just everything your website needs to succeed.

items.title: Unlimited Content Updates Forever
items.text: Change prices, add services, update photos anytime. No extra charges, no waiting. Email us your changes—updated within 24 hours. Your website grows with your business.

items.title: Mobile-First Design That Converts
items.text: Every button, image, and form designed for mobile phones first. 75% of bookings happen on phones—your site must work perfectly where customers actually browse.

items.title: Optimized For Lightning-Fast Performance
items.text: Consistent 95-100 Google PageSpeed scores. Fast sites rank higher, keep visitors engaged, and convert more browsers into paying customers. Slow sites lose bookings—yours won't.

items.title: Hand-Coded, SEO-First Approach
items.text: Clean, semantic code without bloated builders or plugins. Proper structure, optimized meta tags, schema markup—everything Google needs to rank you for "Thai massage near me."

items.title: Built Specifically For Thai Massage Businesses
items.text: Every detail tailored for traditional Thai healing—treatment menus, service pages, authentic elements. Purpose-built for your industry, not a generic business template.

items.title: Bilingual Websites: English + Any Language
items.text: Full site in English plus German, Italian, Spanish, or any language. One-click switching, professionally translated content—no awkward Google Translate. Reach every customer.

cta.title: Ready for Your Professional Website?
cta.text: Let's talk about your business and show you exactly how our website system works.
